metadata.title: CVE-2023-6736 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab EE affecting all versions startingfrom 11.3 before 16.6.7, all versions starting from 16.7 before 16.7.5, allversions starting from 16.8 before 16.8.2. It was possible for an attackerto cause a client-side denial of service using malicious crafted content inthe CODEOWNERS file.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
